sentence.Network_en: Why give publicity to this self-indulgent, adolescent oaf?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么要宣传报道这个行为任性、青春期未满的白痴呢？

sentence.Network_en: To buy flowers for myself seems wildly self-indulgent.
sentence.Network_cn: 为自己买花似乎太放纵自己了。

sentence.Network_en: to take an indulgent view of sth

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... maven n. <美口>专家,内行 27。 indulgent adj. 纵容的 28。 wheedle vt. 诱骗, 哄骗, 骗得 29。.
SAT官方发布高频词汇汇总_百度文库 ... radical： 根本的 indulgent： 放纵的 enrage： 愤怒.
修饰人的形容词归纳_百度文库 ... independent 独立的 indulgent 放荡的,溺爱的 industrious 勤奋的.
稀_百度百科 ... [indulgent] 不认真，马马虎虎 [sparse] 稀少；稀疏.

list.abs: 纵字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 纵然〖 evenif;eventhough〗 纵容〖 indulge;pamper;connive;winkat〗 纵身〖 jump;leap〗.
Carácter « 所 » - Dicionário de sinogramas ... 在所不惜[ will not grudge] 恣心所欲[ indulge oneself] ( 厕所 )[ toilet].
恣意_百度百科 ... [behave recklessly] 肆意作为,无所顾忌 [indulge oneself] 恣纵己意,心想事成.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译英语词汇网 -... ... plenarily 充分地 plenary indulgence 大赦 plenary 无限的.
节假日来袭：10种方式教你一个... ... 7. Volunteer 当志愿者 8. Indulge yourself 犒劳自己 9. Random Act of Kindness 做点善事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin indulgent- 'giving free rein to', from the verb indulgere

entry.def: If you are indulgent, you treat a person with special kindness, often in a way that is not good for them.

example.ex: His indulgent mother was willing to let him do anything he wanted.
example.tran: 他母亲很溺爱他，任由他想干什么就干什么。

means.word_mean: 1. showing or characterized by or given to indulgence;

sentences.sentence: "procedures are lax and discipline is weak"

auth_sentence.content: His interesting ideas are rather marred by a self-indulgent...style.
auth_sentence.res_content: His interesting ideas are rather marred by a self-indulgent...style.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His interesting ideas are rather marred by a self-indulgent...style.

auth_sentence.content: Seems like a good excuse to be completely self-indulgent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seems like a good excuse to be completely self-indulgent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seems like a good excuse to be completely self-indulgent.

auth_sentence.content: In other places however, things are a bit indulgent.
auth_sentence.res_content: In other places however, things are a bit indulgent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In other places however, things are a bit indulgent.

sentences.en: He was an indulgent father,ever ready to provide new clothes.
sentences.cn: 他是个溺爱的父亲,随时乐意给孩子买新衣服。
